title: "exchange.storeprocessor.chat.notFriends" Doesn't apply.
body:
Getting this error message when I try to send a mystery gift: 'exchange.storeprocessor.chat.notFriends'

* Neither of us have any type of ban or restriction.
* Haven't sent any gifts in the last 24 hours.
* Been friends for awhile.

I've been able to send gifts before. Anyone else have a similar problem? Is this a technical issue?

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
Excuse me, how long it will take to fix it?
It's fixed!

So fast

https://i.imgur.com/7lZwLKc.jpg
{{champion:33}} OK
oh of course Riot responds to the threads about people not being able to buy things from them.
lol there's different teams for different types of problems and threads.
This. I happen to work closely with the team who works on this content. :P
Also having a problem with gifting a friend. The store keeps saying we haven't been friends long enough but we've been friends on league for over a year.
Guys! I fixed it by simply repairing my League client! I got the same error then repaired and was able to gift my gf the new Caitlyn skin! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Same for me, repaired client and was able to gift the skin afterwards.
Same issue here. Wanted to gift my boyfriend the new Wukong skin and snow day Bard but get this message
i want to gift my bf too the wu skin and i get this message ;/
IT then said you havent been friends long enough when we been friends on it for almost two years
i keep trying and nothing changes we been friends for over 2 years too ;c i was so excited to gift him the skin xD
I was gonna gift my bae Lunar Wraith Cait ; - ;
i need a response at least what time they are going to fix it xD

> [{quoted}](name=NothingsEnd,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VptVugRR,comment-id=00080000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-27T01:51:42.876+0000)
>
>bae

cringe
XD I was like BABE TAKE THIS SKIN......Oh...Riot said no
i have the same problem
I have the same problem too. It's my friend's bday and I was playing on giving her Dragon Trainer Tristana. How long will it take to fix this?

I tried sending a friend the new Caitlyn skin but I got this as an answer, "exchange.storeprocessor.chat.notFriends". I have been friends with this person for a year at least and now I can't send a thing. RIOT, if you won't allow my skin to go through I will happily have my $20 back.
Try running as Admin.  I had this problem and i tried running league in Admin and it started working again.

> [{quoted}](name=pduyao808,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VptVugRR,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2016-01-27T03:52:19.710+0000)
>
> Try running as Admin.  I had this problem and i tried running league in Admin and it started working again.

Worked for me... Thanks!!!!
Same prob here rito pls halp{{item:3070}}
same problem
Don't forget to upvote the original post so Rito sees it. 17 people have commented (so far) but only 12 upvotes. Assuming no one downvoted as there is really no reason to do so. unless u are trolling

You are unable to send this gift for one of the following reasons:
exchange.storeprocessor.chat.notFriends 

What happend with that?
Its happening to me too I even took a screenshot because I'm really mad about this. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  fix this rito >.>
Same issue I just want to gift a birthday presentT.T
I'm having the same problem, i'm trying to use the lunar sale and i get this error. Please help

Also having this issue. My boyfriend sent me a skin not even 5 hours ago. I tried to send one to a friend about an hour ago and it gives me the same error message. Hope Riot sees this thread soon or responds to my ticket.
Me and a friend of mine are from EUW and we are having the same problem :/
Wanted to gift my bro the radiant wukong skin but got this error.  How long do they usually take to fix these kind of things?

Same problem here, except I thought removing and then adding them again(they accepted right away) would fix it, but that wasn't the case. This person literally sent me a gift last night and now we can't send each other gifts. This is my first time facing this problem. Please help!
I too am having this provlem
{{champion:32}}  I would have this problem... If I had friends {{item:3070}}
I seem to be getting a problem with gifting also but mine says we haven't been friends for enough time even tho i've send him many gifts before?
Restart Client or Repair It - just did it and it worked <3

Yup, same here, It has been like that for over 2 hours now, I wanted to buy the lunar skins for my husband before he comes back home and nope, Rito took my money and doesnt let me spent my RP. I have been checking the League boards and several people are complaining about the same, no answer from Riot. I will update it I see something. EDIT: I have been checking the forums and this issue is not just in NA, other servers like EU and Latin America are also affected. no notice from Riot yet.
I also wanted to gift my bf :( RIOT FIX THIS NOWWWWWW :(((
This is ridiculous, I accidentally clicked on a Portugal server forum and they are getting the same issue, maybe it's a international problem? Either way, Riot needs to handle it.
even the latin american server has it
Glad to know I'm not the only one with this problem. Signal boost the main comment so Riot can see!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Same issue here....its my friend's bday...I wanted to gift her a skin...
same ugh
same, failed send the new wukong skin to my bf :(((((
With the same problem, i just want to know the time to solve it xD.
I gifted my friend the new Wukong skin and was about to gift my other friend the Morgana skin, but after sending the wukong skin, i couldnt send the other one.
